description.en: Identifying problems and issues. Describing problems. Gathering information necessary for solving problems. Analysing problems. Making suggestions for solving problems. The methods of problem-based learning are applied.
description.et: Probleemi leidmine. Probleemi kirjeldamine. Probleemi lahendamiseks vajaliku info kogumine. Probleemi analüüsimine. Probleemi lahendamine ja ettepanekute esitamine. Rakendatakse probleemipõhise õppe meetodit.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to give students the opportunity to solve a case study representing an issue or problem prevalent at a social or rehabilitation institution. The students have to utilize the knowledge and skills they have obtained throughout the various courses they have passed and establish connections between theory and practice.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on anda üliõpilastele võimalus lahendada ühes sotsiaal- või rehabilitatsiooniasutuses olev probleem kasutades erinevates ainetes õpitud teadmisi ja oskusi ning luua seoseid teooria ja praktika vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) analyzes problems occurring at an organisation;
2) applyes appropriate principles and methods for solving problems;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) rakendab probleemide lahendamiseks vajalikke lähenemisi ja meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) makes use of obtained knowledge and skills for solving problems;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) rakendab probleemi lahendamiseks omandatud teadmisi ja oskusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) analyzes and makes conclusions and suggestions for solving problems.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) analüüsib, teeb järeldusi ja ettepanekuid probleemi lahendamiseks.
